title: cant Refund
body: i bought lee sin with rp just until i had enough ip to buy him with but I cannot refund him (Yes I Have Refunds){{item:3070}} {{champion:119}}

replies.body: The client won't let you refund Lee Sin since you currently have the God Fist skin unlocked. If you write in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to refund Lee Sin (not the skin) for one of your tokens! ^_^

Hi JustJukes,

Has it been more than 90 days since you bought Lee Sin? If yes, there's is a 90 day limit to refund content, once that time has passed, it's no longer refundable.
no, it hasn't I haven't even had the account longer than that
